title: Once upon a time
text-title: Who lived on a beautiful carousel
text-content: It had painted ears, and the body was made of paper! Running, trálálá, jumping, trálálá, little horse never leaves its place. Running, trálálá, jumping, trálálá.
text-legend: // Little horse never leaves its place.

me-profile1: I'm a Multimedia Technician in love with the audiovisual content, but also with interests in areas as design, 3D modelation, virtual reality, augmented reality, web design and multimedia interfaces.
me-profile2: I'm dedicated, honest, commited and I learn quickly whenever I need to evolve. I'm not afraid of a challenge, because I believe that's the discomfort that can make me a better professional.
